tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages
type: Tutorial Step - Back to the Position!

definition.text: Back to this first trade, we discussed how stages work and mentioned that the price tagged the stop loss target.

paragraphs.text: That means that this first position is a fail!

To be fair, the trade went in our favor up to about 3%, but we didn't take profit and let it slip through our fingers. The entry wasn't awful and it may make sense once we start thinking about position management.
Let's take a little tour along the period tested and make a quick assessment of the rest of the positions taken!
